Room.Name: Before the Temple of the Ancients
Room.Description: A massive structure made of solid granite rises out of the mountains of the Crooked Teeth. Her jagged peaks loom high above you, deformed and twisted and covered in shimmering red snow, made thus by the strange darkened light of Orthos' two red-dwarf stars. No life breathes here and the cold stone is a reminder of the harsh environment and chilling embrace of this wilderness. The temple itself arches over one hundred feet into the air, its curved walls soaring up alongside the monumental cliffs surrounding it. Tattered banners hang from above a single massive open gateway leading into the sanctum. A strange, comforting warmth eminates from within its depths, promising shelter from the brutal wind and unforgiving hail and sleet.

Exit.Description: Massive steps ascend to a great gate, beckoning to you with its warmth.

ExtraDescription.Description: A temple rises out of the mountains, set against the jagged peaks of the Crooked Teeth.
Dozens of worn, tattered banners blow wildly overhead. They seem to be in numerous colors and each bears a strange, ancient symbol of power.
There is only one entrance into the Temple of the Ancients - a single, massive gateway which seems to have previously been sealed but now lay in ruins.

Room.Name: Within a Luminous Antechamber
Room.Description: Ambient light fills this chamber, seemingly coming from the very walls themselves and it casts away every shadow therein. Somehow, the very stone itself seems to hum with pulsating magic. A small dais is raised against the western wall of this vast cavern, with a large crate in front of it. Beneath you, a solid stone floor made of perfectly smooth granite has been carved out of the mountain, clearly the work of the dwarf-kin.

Exit.Description: The vast, luminous antechamber continues this way.
A massive gateway opens to descend down a long series of stone steps outside the temple.
The vast, luminous antechamber continues this way.

ExtraDescription.Description: This small platform sits just a foot or two above the ground, clearly made for speaking.

Room.Name: Within a Luminous Antechamber
Room.Description: Ambient light fills this chamber, seemingly coming from the very walls themselves and it casts away every shadow therein. Somehow, the very stone itself seems to hum with pulsating magic. Beneath you, a solid stone floor made of perfectly smooth granite has been carved out of the mountain, clearly the work of the dwarf-kin. A makeshift forge has been set up against the northeastern corner, with a blasting fire pit that roars monstrously. Above it, open vents collect the smoke and funnel them through long metal tubes which lead straight precariously along the wall heading to the south. Not too far from the forge, set against the northern wall is a small crystal fountain with a jewel-encrusted basin brimming with water. Two dwarves dressed in the garb of warriors work the forge, toiling methodically together. In the very center of the chamber, a massive yet headless statue stands erect.

Exit.Description: The vast, luminous antechamber continues this way.
The vast, luminous antechamber continues this way.

ExtraDescription.Description: Rising out of the center of the northern side of this luminous chamber, a beautifully-crafted fountain made of crystal protrudes perfectly from the glowing walls. There is no mouth from which water pours forth. Only a jewel-encrusted basin brimming with water from some unkown source beneath the mountains.

...The cloaked figure's hand points directly toward the fountain set against the wall of the chamber and as your eyes focus a little more clearly, you suddenly notice a perfectly hidden cube floating above the fountain...

...You stand directly underneath this massive statue carved from the single bone of a dragon. It bears the visage of a cloaked warrior, with the hilts of two blades portruding from his cloak. His head is missing, having been sundered away long ago by some powerful force... You notice his left hand slipping out of his cloak... Something about the way his hand is pointing...
A makeshift forge has been established in this very unusual place on a seemingly permanent basis. Several dwarves gather around the forge, taking their turn at working with various precious metals.

Room.Name: Within a Luminous Antechamber
Room.Description: Ambient light fills this chamber, seemingly coming from the very walls themselves and it casts away every shadow therein. Somehow, the very stone itself seems to hum with pulsating magic. Beneath you, a solid stone floor made of perfectly smooth granite has been carved out of the mountain, clearly the work of the dwarf-kin. A small crystal fountain with a jewel-encrusted basin brimming with water extends from of the southern wall. A circle of small wooden tables are in the center of the chamber, covered in ancient texts and various artifacts. Several wizards, along with a few heavily armed men stand around them discussing various important matters amongst themselves. Surrounded by the tables tables, standing erect in the middle of the chamber for all to see is a monumental statue.

Exit.Description: The vast, luminous antechamber continues this way.
The vast, luminous antechamber continues this way.

ExtraDescription.Description: Rising out of the center of the southern side of this luminous chamber, a beautifully-crafted fountain made of crystal protrudes perfectly from the glowing walls. There is no mouth from which water pours forth. Only a jewel-encrusted basin brimming with water from some unkown source beneath the mountains.

A dozen square tables made of wood have been set into a circle in the wide open space of the luminous chamber. They're covered in a multitude of valuable texts and ancient artifacts, yet you cannot get close enough to them to have a decent look. The wizards and armed men who stand here hover too closely over their prized possessions...

...The weapon is carved perfectly from dragon bone. One can only surmise that the authentic one was quite blunt, indeed. Odd... You cannot approach the statue to look more closely but as you turn you notice that the baton points directly to the fountain set against the northern wall. As your eyes focus a little more clearly, you suddenly notice a perfectly hidden cube floating above the fountain...
...The tall man carved from bone holds one arm stretched out with a slender baton held in hand, the other is bent upwards with a long, slender horn pressed to his lips...

...You see a tall, slender man perfectly carved from the single giant bone of a dragon... One of the armed men cuts you off before you can approach the statue but you notice the man is holding a long, slender horn...

Room.Name: Within a Luminous Antechamber
Room.Description: Ambient light fills this chamber, seemingly coming from the very walls themselves and it casts away every shadow therein. Somehow, the very stone itself seems to hum with pulsating magic. Beneath you, a solid stone floor made of perfectly smooth granite has been carved out of the mountain, clearly the work of the dwarf-kin. The sounds of music being played resonates from farther down the chamber, somewhere to the west. To the east, you can hear the banging of hammers and the vigorous grunting of a few dwarves. A group of men sit huddled against the southern, inner wall of the antechamber, playing dice amongst themselves and bantering back and forth.

Exit.Description: The vast, luminous antechamber continues this way.
The vast, luminous antechamber continues this way.

Room.Name: Within a Luminous Antechamber
Room.Description: Ambient light fills this chamber, seemingly coming from the very walls themselves and it casts away every shadow therein. Somehow, the very stone itself seems to hum with pulsating magic. Beneath you, a solid stone floor made of perfectly smooth granite has been carved out of the mountain, clearly the work of the dwarf-kin. Set against the northern wall is a small crystal fountain with a jewel-encrusted basin brimming with water. The sounds of music being played resonates from farther down the chamber, somewhere to the south. In the center of the chamber, a massive replica carved from bone has been split in two. A slender, beautiful woman stands beside a single oaken table near the statue, reading one of the many scrolls laying upon it.

Exit.Description: The vast, luminous antechamber continues this way.
The vast, luminous antechamber continues this way.

ExtraDescription.Description: Manual Use Instructions: Typically, we Elfete have traveled among the stars with ease, from one world to another with just a thought. But as time wears on and our link to the Ancestors grows weaker, so do we. We have preserved some of our magic within our own descendants and even more so in the countless relics and artifacts, of which many of the Elfete have had to sacrifice their very lives to create or possess. Now, we use the Ancient Wells to travel great distances. Were the Drowiin to take control of one of these wells, all would be lost. They would hunt the Elfete and their descendants to extinction on every world. All of the relics and artifacts we have left behind can be used in some fashion to aid in our cause. One's understanding of an artifact could allow them to use it in one way, or to go to a particular place, while another's unique knowledge might allow them to access another power from it. On the other hand, some basic truths remain the same. You will have to discover these on your own, as it would take a whole lifetime to explain the full usage of a single relic.

... It is difficult to translate the runes but you can make a few out... The bloodscript describes a great war between the descendants of the Ancients and the dragons. It also describes a great holocaust of the Elfete by the hands of their cousins, the Drowiin and the treachery of the dragons against the Drowiin but only in brief detail... Whatever great mysteries are hidden in this bloodscript have been lost with time...

...You flip the note to Delinah over and it reads, "Delinah, I know we have had our differences in the past but I would like for you to come home. Your family would like for you you to come home. We miss you. It has been six years since we have seen you and two since we have heard from you. Do not give your life for these... You know. When you have a life waiting for you here! Your son is nearly fifteen. He speaks of you always. So do I. I still drink tea by the old cypress tree when the stars go down.

...One of the letters has a single word, 'Delinah' written on one side of it... Another piece of paper, the single page from what looks to be a series of images written in runic bloodscript lay near it as well as a small guide of significant interest...

This roughly drawn map describes the temple which has been carved into the side of what are called the Mountains of the Crooked Teeth. It shows a large chamber being hollowed out and protected with magic, then a long shaft extending down from the center of that chamber into a great dwarven meeting hall of some kind. The area seems to me marked with tiny, festive dwarves in eternal celebration. To the east of that meeting hall, you see some sort of black circle with another black circle placed closer to the bottom of the map. This one leads down another dark shaft to a single large gate. Above it reads, 'The King's Labyrinth'

Ancient scrolls and vellum texts and even a few small books are scattered over this massive table made of oak. A map rests on the edge, folded open with tiny weights holding it at the corners. A small pile of notes and letters sits next to it.

...The King and his weapon alike are squared off toward the corner of the chamber. Toward the crystal fountain... As your eyes focus a little more clearly, you suddenly notice a perfectly hidden cube floating above the fountain...

...You see a magnificent statue here, standing nearly seven feet tall and carved perfectly out of a single piece of dragon bone. It bears the liking of a great dwarven king, holding a massive two-handed battleaxe with both hands in a battle pose... Still standing, the statue has nonetheless been cut perfectly, from its left ear to the inside of its torso, as if by some magical razor-like force.

Rising out of the center of the northern side of this luminous chamber, a beautifully-crafted fountain made of crystal protrudes perfectly from the glowing walls. There is no mouth from which water pours forth. Only a jewel-encrusted basin brimming with water from some unkown source beneath the mountains.

Room.Name: Within a Luminous Antechamber
Room.Description: Ambient light fills this chamber, seemingly coming from the very walls themselves and it casts away every shadow therein. Somehow, the very stone itself seems to hum with pulsating magic. Beneath you, a solid stone floor made of perfectly smooth granite has been carved out of the mountain, clearly the work of the dwarf-kin. The sounds of music being played resonates loudly from the west.

Exit.Description: The vast, luminous antechamber continues this way.
The chamber gives way to a spiral staircase.
The vast, luminous antechamber continues this way.
The vast, luminous antechamber continues this way.

Room.Name: Within a Luminous Antechamber
Room.Description: light fills this chamber, seemingly coming from the very walls themselves and it casts away every shadow therein. Somehow, the very stone itself seems to hum with pulsating magic. Beneath you, a solid stone floor made of perfectly smooth granite has been carved out of the mountain, clearly the work of the dwarf-kin. A small crystal fountain with a jewel-encrusted basin brimming with water extends from of the southern wall. The sounds of music being played resonates from farther down the chamber, somewhere to the north.

Exit.Description: The vast, luminous antechamber continues this way.
The vast, luminous antechamber continues this way.

ExtraDescription.Description: Rising out of the center of the southern side of this luminous chamber, a beautifully-crafted fountain made of crystal protrudes perfectly from the glowing walls. There is no mouth from which water pours forth. Only a jewel-encrusted basin brimming with water from some unkown source beneath the mountains.

Room.Name: Within a Luminous Antechamber
Room.Description: Ambient light fills this chamber, seemingly coming from the very walls themselves and it casts away every shadow therein. Somehow, the very stone itself seems to hum with pulsating magic. Beneath you, a solid stone floor made of perfectly smooth granite has been carved out of the mountain, clearly the work of the dwarf-kin. The sounds of music being played resonates from farther down the chamber, somewhere to the west.

Exit.Description: The vast, luminous antechamber continues this way.
The vast, luminous antechamber continues this way.

Room.Name: Within a Luminous Antechamber
Room.Description: Ambient light fills this chamber, seemingly coming from the very walls themselves and it casts away every shadow therein. Somehow, the very stone itself seems to hum with pulsating magic. Beneath you, a solid stone floor made of perfectly smooth granite has been carved out of the mountain, clearly the work of the dwarf-kin.

Exit.Description: The vast, luminous antechamber continues this way.

Room.Name: The Top of a Granite Cylinder
At the Bottom of a Cylinder
The Mouth of a Large Cavern
The End of a Dark Corridor
Above the Well of the Ancients
A Narrow Shaft Beneath the Throne
A Narrow Shaft Beneath the Throne
A Slight Berth in the Tunnel
A Slight Berth in the Tunnel
A Slight Berth in the Tunnel
Near a Collapsed Section in the Tunnel
The Mouth of a Large Cave
Along the Edge of a Ravine
A Narrow Trail Over the Rise
A Narrow Trail Over the Rise
A Narrow Trail Through the Mountains
A Narrow Trail Through the Mountains
A Narrow Trail Through the Mountains
A Narrow Trail Through the Mountains
Along the Edge of a Ravine
Along the Edge of a Ravine
Along the Edge of a Ravine
Along the Edge of a Ravine
Rugged Trail through the Mountains
Room.Description: The jagged spikes of the Crooked Tooth mountains rise up thousands of feet into the air above you and plunges into a deep ravine to your south. Their sharp ledges rise above you, covered in ice and snow. You can make your way roughly along the trail, though this path is really just a series of connected, rugged footpaths used by the inhabitants of this range. Bloodthirsty shrieks suddenly fill the air along the edge of the cliffs to the east of you, carried hauntingly by the wind which violently whips across the face of these mountains. The way is treacherous, but you can see that the path continues up the mountain or south onto a sharp ledge over the cliffs.

Room.Name: Rugged Trail through the Mountains
Room.Description: The jagged spikes of the Crooked Tooth mountains rises up thousands of feet into the air above you and plunges into a deep ravine to your south. Their sharp ledges rise above you, covered in ice and snow. You can make your way roughly along the trail, though this path is really just a series of connected, rugged footpaths used by the inhabitants of this range. The way is treacherous, but you can see that the path continues north or down into the ravine. Bloodthirsty shrieks suddenly fill the air along the edge of the cliffs to the east of you, carried hauntingly by the wind which violently whips across the face of these mountains.

Room.Name: Rugged Trail through the Mountains
Room.Description: Bloodthirsty shrieks fill the air along the edge of the cliffs to the east of you, carried hauntingly by the wind which whips across the face of the Crooked Tooth Mountains. Their jagged spikes rising thousands of feet into the air above you and plunging into a deep ravine to your south. The way is treacherous, but you can see that the path continues up or south into the ravine. Sharp ledges rise above you, covered in ice and snow. You can make your way roughly along the trail, though this path is really just a series of connected, rugged footpaths used by the inhabitants of this range.

Room.Name: Rugged Trail through the Mountains
Room.Description: Sharp ledges rise above you, covered in ice and snow. You can make your way roughly along the trail, which is really just a series of connected, rugged footpaths used by the inhabitants of this range. Bloodthirsty shrieks fill the air along the edge of the cliffs to the east of you, carried hauntingly by the wind. The winds howl and whip across the face of the mountains leering above you, twisted and jagged spikes rising thousands of feet into the air above you and plunging into a deep ravine to your south. The way is treacherous, but you can see that the path continues west and down into the ravine.

Room.Name: Rugged Trail through the Mountains
Room.Description: The winds howl and whip across the face of the mountains leering above you, twisted and jagged spikes rising thousands of feet into the air above you and plunging into a deep ravine to your south. Sharp ledges rise above you, covered in ice and snow. You can make your way roughly along the trail, which is really just a series of connected, rugged footpaths used by the inhabitants of this range. Bloodthirsty shrieks fill the air along the edge of the cliffs to the east of you, carried hauntingly by the wind. The way is treacherous, but you can see that the path begins to widen to the north of you and open up before a massive, stone stronghold.

Room.Name: A Widening Path
Room.Description: The winds howl and whip across the face of the mountains leering above you, twisted and jagged spikes rising thousands of feet into the air above you and plunging into a deep ravine to your south. A wide path has been carved out of the mountain itself to create more ease of travel, though the efforts have seemingly stopped here and the path grows wild as you peer southward. Sharp ledges rise above you, covered in ice and snow. The trail broadens to the north and the smell of burning wood and charred flesh emanates heavily from somewhere to the north.

Room.Name: A cluttered room
Room.Description: In the northern end of the room there are some chairs and a couch with pillows. There are a couple of spare blankets strewn about with more folded up next to the couch. To the east is a green wall with a wooden door-frame which is offset to the right side. The middle of the room has a long table going through it parallel to the north and south walls. Light streams from two gloves which hang from chains that hang above the table, their source of power unseen. There are nine wooden backed chairs placed about the table.

NPC.name: stoic dwarf legionnaire guard
NPC.description: This well-armed dwarf stands at attention with his back straight, lance unmoving. His back toward the dais, he watches the Gateway with careful intent. His muscles thick and well-honed, he is clearly a veteran of warfare.
NPC.longDescription: A stoic dwarven legionnaire stands guard near the small dais.

NPC.name: aleneia woman elf elven sorceress
NPC.longDescription: A slender elven woman stands here, dressed in the garments of a sorceress.

NPC.name: rotund dwarf dwarven Coragn
NPC.longDescription: A rotund dwarf stands here, hands on his hips.

NPC.name: man mekantos master sorcerer
NPC.longDescription: A man is here, cloaked in numerous magical relics and clearly a master of his craft.

NPC.name: creature shadow lurker
NPC.longDescription: A creature lurks in the shadows, a menacing snarl on his lips.

NPC.name: scarred dwarf Yaofhil
NPC.longDescription: A scarred and badly-burned dwarf stands over the forge, a pair of tongs in his hands.

NPC.name: man mekantos master sorcerer
NPC.longDescription: A man is here, cloaked in numerous magical relics and clearly a master of his craft.

NPC.name: man mekantos master sorcerer
NPC.longDescription: A man is here, cloaked in numerous magical relics and clearly a master of his craft.

NPC.name: hook mawed brown wyvern
NPC.longDescription: A brown, hook-mawed wyvern shrieks fiercely from her perch on a jutting rock.

NPC.name: dirty wyvern
NPC.description: A shrieking, angry wyvern mother snarls viciously and bares her teeth to reveal great fangs, curved into forty razor-sharp blades. This tiny creature would be harmless on its own... But the sound of shrieking resonates here along the edge of the mountains of the Crooked Teeth. It will either run or it will have to be put down. Its vicious snarl leaves no mistake as to its intent.
NPC.longDescription: Hissing in confusion, a dirty wyvern grunts as he scurries along the trail.

NPC.name: hulking massive Yeti
NPC.description: Taking up most of the space in this small cave, this hulking, hairy beast snarls menacing, its chin dripping with bile and spittle. With claws the size of giant clubs, appears to mean harm to any who dare trespass.
NPC.longDescription: Gargantuan in size, this hulking yeti glares angrily as it struggles to move freely in the cave.

Item.Name: long titanium lance shaft
Item.ShortDescription: a long titanium lance tipped with hematite
Item.LongDescription: A long titanium shaft tipped with hematite lies here.

Item.Name: large wooden crate
Item.LongDescription: An intricately-carved wooden crate sits in front of the small dais.

ExtraDescription.Description: A large wooden crate rests in front of the small dais, holding several interesting trinkets of seemingly considerable value. The markings on its surface are intricate and seemingly fashioned by a master craftsman. Humming with power, one can only wonder what's inside...

Item.Name: carved bone drake chipped
Item.LongDescription: An ornately-carved, chipped bone of a drake is here.

Item.Name: ram figurine
Item.LongDescription: A figurine of a ram sits here.

Item.Name: animated quiet sign
Item.LongDescription: A sign is here warning you to be quiet.

Item.Name: everfull skin
Item.LongDescription: An everfull skin is here.

ExtraDescription.Description: This skin seems to be quite full!

Item.Name: hidden cube
Item.ShortDescription: a perfect cube, humming with magic

ExtraDescription.Description: ... Your eyes have trouble focusing on this magically vibrating cube as it comes in and out of focus above the fountain...

Item.Name: ring slender titanium
Item.LongDescription: A perfectly-carved, slender ring made of titanium is here.

Item.Name: mantle red stole
Item.ShortDescription: a cloth mantle with a blood-red stole
Item.LongDescription: A pile of cloth with a red stole is here.

Item.Name: plate breastplate black enamel
Item.ShortDescription: a breastplate made of black enamel
Item.LongDescription: A breastplate made entirely of black enamel is here.

Item.Name: silver helm visor
Item.ShortDescription: a silver helm with a single visor
Item.LongDescription: A shiny silver helm with a single visor is here.

Item.Name: silver plated leggings
Item.LongDescription: A pristine pair of silver-plated leggings are here.

Item.Name: silver plated sleeves
Item.LongDescription: A radiant pair of silver-plated sleeves is here.

Item.Name: gauntlets woven steel fabric
Item.LongDescription: A pair of gauntlets made from woven-steel fabric are here.

Item.Name: black leather boots
Item.LongDescription: Some black-plated, leather-hide boots are here.

Item.Name: bracer onyx
Item.ShortDescription: a battle-worn bracer clasped in onyx
Item.LongDescription: A bracer bound in onyx is here.

Item.Name: girth woven steel fabric
Item.LongDescription: A girth made of woven-steel is here, its fabric vibrating.

Item.Name: blood red leather cloak
Item.LongDescription: A long blood-red leather cloak is here.

Item.Name: cobbled stone black well
Item.LongDescription: A black well, made of cobbled stone and mortar is here.

ExtraDescription.Description: Cobbled stone and mortar has been formed three feet high, into a perfect, circular well with shimmering black waters... A small inscription has been carved into a base board near the front of the well's structure.
'Do not fear that which you cannot understand. Use it.'

Item.Name: robes sentinel wizard
Item.LongDescription: A pair of long, flowing robes lay here, shimmering with divine radiance.

ExtraDescription.Description: These robes, woven with a fabric not known to the world of Orthos, shine in magnificent splendor.

Item.Name: huge glass bong
Item.LongDescription: A huge, intricately blown glass bong lies here on the ground.

Item.Name: no name
Item.LongDescription: (no description)

Item.Name: breastplate runes
Item.ShortDescription: woven-steel breastplate etched with gilded runes
Item.LongDescription: A woven-steel breastplate lay discarded here.

Item.Name: magical chest
Item.LongDescription: There is a magical chest in the corner.

Quest.Name: say_hello
Quest.Description: Go to the dwarven legionnaire, respond with 'Hello'
